Homestead.Homestead Historic Downtown District: The Homestead Historic Downtown District, is a U.S. Historic District (designated as such on November 19, 2007) located in Homestead, Florida, United States. It is bound by Northwest 4th Street, South Railroad Avenue, Southeast 1st Road and North Krome Drive. Originally opened in 1921, the 500-seat Seminole on Krome Avenue was built for Henry Booker, Sr.
